text: phir usase kaha gaya ki aap ab mahal me chalie to jab usane mahal (mein sheeshe ke pharsh) ko dekha to usako gahara paanee samajhee (aur guzarane ke lie is tarah apane paeche utha lie ki) apanee donon pindaliyaan khol dee sulemaan ne kaha (tum daro nahin) ye (paanee nahin hai) mahal hai jo sheeshe se madha hua hai (us vakt tambeeh huee aur) arz kee paravaradigaar maine (aaphataab ko pooja kar) yaqeenan apane oopar zulm kiya
